answers.answer: I failed my 3 hour glucose test...  I'm also due June 21. What are you having?
I failed the one hour, I am wondering if it's something I ate or drank before the test. Now, I have to schedule the 3hrs test, it's nerve racking.
I have my csection scheduled already! I'm due June 2 and it will be may 26. I also got my results for glucose test next day.
I just did my 1hr on Tues. I was told results can take up to a week.

My doctor just skipped my 1hr test because he was finding sugar in my urine. I already have hypertension I'm just worried if I have gestational diabetes I will be on stuck on the problem pregnancy floor at the hospital for the rest of my pregnancy.
I failed my 3 hour. Took 2days to get the results back. I've been watching my diet and keeping my levels low, so everything is looking good. I am 29.5 weeks
I'm anxious to see what my test results are. I did my 3hr on Friday so I should be getting a call weather I passed or failed on Monday or Tuesday.

question: I just had to do my glucose test I failed the first one so I had to do the 3 he one. Does anyone know how long the test take to come back? She said there was a little bit of sugar in my urine. And has anyone had their c section scheduled yet? Due to pregnancy induced hypertension I have to have a c section like I did for my first pregnancy. I'm due June 21.
title: C section and glucose test?
